entry.string: Are you sure you want to delete category '#(1)'?
entry.translation: Ere-a yuoo soore-a yuoo vunt tu delete-a cetegury '#(1)'?

entry.string: This category has #(1) sub-categories and #(2) module items assigned to them.
entry.translation: Thees cetegury hes #(1) soob-cetegureees und #(2) mudoole-a items esseegned tu zeem.
